hanze.PIV1E.leertaak2.actor

Class Hunter

  • java.lang.Object
    • hanze.PIV1E.leertaak2.actor.Human
      • hanze.PIV1E.leertaak2.actor.Hunter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor

    public class Hunter
extends Human
    A simple model of a hunter. hunters age, move, eat foxes, rabbits and bears and die.
    Author:
    Tsjeard de Winter en Rick van der Poel

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hunter

        public Hunter(Field field,
              Location location,
              AbstractModel model)
        Create a hunter. A hunter stays in the game to hunt the over populated species.
        Parameters:
        field - The field currently occupied.
        location - The location within the field.
        model - The model that is used

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        This is what the hunter does most of the time: it hunts for bears, rabbits and foxes. In the process it might die by a bear of old age.
